document:
<sentence id="s2" text="G protein-coupled acetylcholine receptor signaling pathway is located at 1q42-43 which was reported to associate with bladder cancer.">
<sentence id="s3" text="Our study attempted to delineate whether genetic variants of li>G protein-coupled acetylcholine receptor signaling pathway contribute to bladder cancer in Chinese Han population in south Taiwan.">
<sentence id="s4" text="Five haplotypes (GTTAT, ATTGT, GCTAC, ACTAC, and ACCAC) were found significantly associated with low li>G protein-coupled acetylcholine receptor signaling pathway mRNA level and contributed to increased susceptibility of bladder cancer in Kaohsiung city after rigid 10000 consecutive permutation tests.">
<sentence id="s5" text="To our knowledge, this is the first genetic association study that reveals the genetic contribution of li>G protein-coupled acetylcholine receptor signaling pathway gene in bladder cancer etiology">
